# QC overview


### UPN + cell type + subgroup

Color by UPN, annotate with text cell type or subgroup

```{r}
plt_text <- get_metadata(so) %>% 
  select(coarse_cell_type, subgroup_v2, starts_with('UMAP')) %>% 
  mutate(txt = ifelse(coarse_cell_type == "malignant",
                      subgroup_v2,
                      coarse_cell_type),
         txt = case_when(
           txt == "lymphocytes" ~ "lymph",
           txt == "macrophage_monocytes" ~ "myel",
           txt == "oligodendrocytes_astrocytes_other" ~ "oligo/astro",
           TRUE ~ txt 
         )) %>% 
  group_by(txt) %>% 
  mutate(txt_label = ifelse(
    scbp:::closest_to_point(data.frame(.data[["UMAP_1"]],
                                .data[["UMAP_2"]]),
                               c(median(UMAP_1),
                                 median(UMAP_2))),
    txt,
    ""
  )) 

p <- plot_umap(so, "UPN", sorted = "random", legend_title = "") + 
  ggrepel::geom_text_repel(data = plt_text,
                           min.segment.length = Inf, 
                           force = 0.2, 
                           point.padding = unit(0.5, "line"),
                           aes(label = txt_label),
                           seed = 1) + 
  guides(color = guide_legend(ncol = 1, override.aes = list(size = 1))) +
  annotate(x = -15,
           y = -18, 
           size = 3,
           geom = "text",
           label = n_cells) +
  theme(legend.text = element_text(size = 8),
        legend.key.size = unit(0.5, 'line'))


save_plot(file.path(all_data_fig_dir, "umap_by_UPN_label_subgroup.pdf"),
          p,
          base_asp = 1.4)
p
# for some reason the plot printed by rstudio is different than the saved plot
# unable to fix with messing around with seeds, save_plot, ggsave, or pdf...
```

### Cell cycle per subpopulation

```{r}
p <- get_metadata(so) %>% 
  select(cell, tumor_subpopulation, Phase) %>% 
  group_by(tumor_subpopulation) %>% 
  mutate(cells_per_subpopulation = n()) %>% 
  group_by(tumor_subpopulation, Phase) %>%
  mutate(cells_per_phase = n(),
            perc = 100 * (cells_per_phase / cells_per_subpopulation)) %>% 
  select(-cell) %>% 
  na.omit() %>% 
  unique() %>% 
  arrange(tumor_subpopulation) %>% 
  mutate(Phase = factor(Phase, levels = c("G1", "S", "G2M"))) %>% 
  mutate(subgroup = str_split(tumor_subpopulation, "-", simplify = T) %>% .[, 1],
         subpopulation = str_split(tumor_subpopulation, "-", simplify = T) %>%
           .[, 2] %>% 
           str_sub(1, 1)) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(tumor_subpopulation, perc)) +
    geom_col(aes(fill = Phase)) +
    scale_fill_manual(values = palette_OkabeIto) + 
    facet_grid(~subpopulation, scales = "free_x") +
    labs(x = "Subpopulation",
         y = "Percent of cells") +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle =90,
                                   hjust = 1,
                                   vjust = 0.5),
        strip.background = element_blank(),
        strip.text = element_blank())

p 

save_plot(file.path(all_neo_fig_dir, "percent_cycling_per_subgroup.pdf"),
          p,
          base_asp = 1.6)
```

```{r}

so_sub <- subset(so, cells = to_keep)
```

```{r}
text_to_show <- tribble(
  ~tumor_subpopulations_shh, ~sub_pop_long, ~go, ~tf, ~genes,
  "SHH-A1", "SHH-A mitotic G2M", "GO: G2M and S phase", "TF: MYBL2", "",
  "SHH-A2", "SHH-A mitotic S", "GO: G2M and S phase", "TF: E2Fs", "",
  "SHH-B1", "SHH-B progenitor 1", "GO: Regulation of neuron\ndifferentiation/Translation", "TF: ATOH1,ZEB1,HES6", "Genes: ATOH1,SFRP1,\nSOX2,SOX9,Ribosomal",
  "SHH-B2", "SHH-B progenitor 2", "GO: Translation", "TF: ELK1,THAP11,MAX", "Genes: Ribosomal",
  "SHH-C1", "SHH-C differentiated 1", "GO: RNA processing/axon-dendritic\ntransport", "TF: POU2F2,KMT2A", "Genes: GRIA2,LUC7L3,DST",
  "SHH-C2", "SHH-C differentiated 2", "GO: Axon development", "TF: SOX4,NEUROD1", "Genes: STMN2/4",
)

find_max_with_limits <- function(x, q = c(0.1, 0.9)){
  lims <- quantile(x, q)
  vals <- x[x > lims[1] & x < lims[2]]
  vals[abs(vals) == max(abs(vals))]
}


plt_dat <- get_metadata(so_sub) %>%
  select(`UMAP_1.1`, `UMAP_2.1`, tumor_subpopulations_shh) %>%
    left_join(text_to_show, by = "tumor_subpopulations_shh") %>%
  mutate(txt_label = str_c(sub_pop_long,
                     go,
                     tf,
                     genes,
                     sep = "\n")) %>%
  group_by(tumor_subpopulations_shh, txt_label) %>%
  summarize(UMAPHarmony_1 = find_max_with_limits(`UMAP_1.1`),
            UMAPHarmony_2 = find_max_with_limits(`UMAP_2.1`))

lval <- 8
p <- plot_harmony(so_sub, "tumor_subpopulations_shh") +
  theme(legend.position = "none") + 
 
  ggrepel::geom_label_repel(data = plt_dat,
                            aes(x = UMAPHarmony_1,
                                y = UMAPHarmony_2,
                                label = txt_label),
                            size = 3, 
                            box.padding =0.1,
                           force = 0.05, 
                           max.overlaps = 2,
                           max.time = 2.0,
                           xlim = c(-lval - 1.5, lval - 1.5),
                           ylim = c(-lval, lval),
                           hjust = 0,
                        fill = alpha("white", 0.5),
                        seed = 42,
                           label.size = 0.5, 
                        direction = "both") +
  coord_cartesian(clip = "off") 

save_plot(file.path(shh_fig_dir, "umap_shh_harmony_overview.pdf"),
          p, 
          base_height = 6,
          base_asp = 1.2)
```

### Northcutt metaprograms

Predict that Harmony + cluster ~= NMF per sample + clustering.

Yep. 

```{r}
shh_mps <- c(
  "SHH-A-cell_cycle",
  "SHH-B-SHH_signaling",
  "SHH-C-Differentiation"
)

names(shh_mps) <- paste0("Hovestadt_et_al_", shh_mps)

plts <- imap(shh_mps,
            ~plot_harmony(so, 
               .x, 
               show_negative = TRUE,
               minimal_theme = TRUE
               ) + 
              labs(title = .y))

out_ids <- names(plts) %>% 
  str_split(., "-") %>% 
  map_chr(., ~str_c(.x[1:2], collapse = "-"))

walk2(plts, out_ids, 
    ~save_plot(file.path(shh_fig_dir, 
                         paste0("umap_shh_by_", .y, ".pdf")),
          .x, 
          base_asp = 1.4))

```

```{r}
find_max_with_limits <- function(x, q = c(0.1, 0.9)){
  lims <- quantile(x, q)
  vals <- x[x > lims[1] & x < lims[2]]
  vals[abs(vals) == max(abs(vals))]
}
```

```{r fig.height = 6}
       x = "") +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(size = 24, angle = 90, hjust = 0.5),
        axis.text.y = element_text(size = 10),
        axis.title = element_blank())

p

save_plot(file.path(immune_fig_dir, 
                    "dotplot_immune_markers.pdf"), 
          p, base_height = 24, base_asp = 0.5)
```

```{r}
mkr_list <- list(
  GP3 = c("GABRA5",
          "IMPG2",
          "EYS",
          "NRL",
          "MAB21L2",
          "NPR3"),
  GP4 = c("RBM24",
          "UNC5D",
          "KCNA1",
          "EOMES",
          "KHDRBS2",
          "OAS1"),
  SHH = c("PDLIM3",
          "EYA1",
          "HHIP",
          "ATOH1",
          "SFRP1")
)

clusters <- c("tumor_subpopulations_gp3", 
              "tumor_subpopulations_gp4", 
              "tumor_subpopulations_shh")

plts <- imap(mkr_list,
    function(mkrs, id) {
      all_subgroups_plot <- list()
      for(i in seq_along(sos)){
        cluster_col <- clusters[i]
        so <- sos[[i]]
        plts <- list()
        to_plot <- c(cluster_col, mkrs)
        for(j in seq_along(to_plot)){

          if(j == 1){
            plts[[j]] <-  plot_harmony(so, cluster_col, 
                    legend_title = "", 
                    minimal_theme = TRUE,
                    label_text = TRUE,
                    label_color = "black",
                    ggrepel_opts = list(force = 0)) +
              labs(title = "")
          } else {
            plts[[j]] <- plot_harmony(so, to_plot[j], 
                    legend_title = "", 
                    minimal_theme = TRUE,
                    label_text = TRUE,
                    label_color = "black",
                    ggrepel_opts = list(force = 0)) +
              labs(title = ifelse(i == 1, to_plot[j], "")) +
              theme(title = element_text(size = 30))
          }
        }
        all_subgroups_plot[[i]] <- plot_grid(plotlist = plts, nrow = 1, ncol = length(mkrs) + 1)
        
      }
      p <- plot_grid(plotlist = all_subgroups_plot, 
                nrow = 3, ncol = 1)
      
      save_plot(file.path(all_neo_fig_dir, 
                           str_c(id, "_marker_overview.pdf")),
                 p, 
                 nrow = 3, 
                 ncol = 7, 
                 base_asp = 1)
      p
})
```
